title: What is the name of music notes? - Quora

response.answer_text: like as in all the notes? well for a single active starting from middle c is, c, d, e, f, g, a, b, c. basically the notes are A-G and then after G its restarts with an A
In the past they were often sung as a scale like ‘do re mi fa so la ti do’ or ‘a b c d e f g a’…
